resources.string: Input todays working hours below. Today is :

"ITE, Is This Enough (can I go home now?) is a small worktime tracker. Functionality include adding and viewing working hours to three different job titles. User can also add descriptions to mark hours. "
Software done as part of Tampere university of applied scienses mobile programming 1 cource (2020). Developed by Tero Taipalus.
"Software uses Butter Knife component, Copyright 2013 Jake Wharton , Apache License, Version 2.0 "
Select job to assingn hours to (optinal)
Hours are wrong. Has to be between 0-23
Minutes wrong. Has to be between 0-59.
